    Querying ChEMBL with AnnotationGx Querying PubChem with AnnotationGx Querying UniChem with AnnotationGx
  • Changelog

    Function reference

    All functions

    API()
    Constructor for an API Connection Class
    addAnnotationColumnToDrugs()
    Adds a new column to the drugs with ids table
    compoundQuery()
    Query the ChEMBL compound API end-point
    constructChemblQuery()
    A general function for creating Queries to the ChEMBL API
    depositZenodo()
    Upload and optionally publish data to Zenodo
    .buildURL()
    Helper function to connect
    .checkThrottlingStatus()
    Checks to see if the PubChem query is exceeding the throttling limit
    .groupListByName()
    Collect repeated list item names into a single list item
    downloadAndExtract()
    Download a compressed file from a remote URL and extract it.
    downloadFDAOrangeBook()
    Download and extract the FDA OrangeBook files from the FDA website
    find_remote_files_recursive()
    Recursively find file URLs from URL with an embedded HTML table (a remote directory)
    getBrainArrayTable()
    Retrieve a table of all available CDF files from BrainArray
    getCellosaurus()
    Build a data.table of annotations from query list.
    getCelloxml()
    Access and parse Cellosaurus xml for regular users
    getChemblAllMechanisms()
    Retrieve a data.table of all molecule mechanisms of action from ChEMBL
    getDrugTargets()
    Extract all drug targets from the target node of the DrugBank .XML file
    getFDAOrangeBookProducts()
    Download and load the FDA OrangeBook products file
    getGencodeAvailableFiles()
    Retrieve a list of files and their descriptions available for a Gencode release and reference genome version.
    getGencodeFTPTable()
    Retrieve the index table for the Gencode FTP web page
    getGencodeFile()
    Download files from the Gencode FTP site and load them as the appropriate Bioconductor classes.
    getGencodeFilesTable()
    Retrieve a table listing all files available from Gencode for a specific database release.
    getGencodeGRangesAnnotated()
    Retrieve a GRanges object for a specific Gencode release with added metadata
    getGuideToPharm()
    Get data from the Guide to PHARMACOLOGY Database Web Services
    getInfoFromCelllineInput()
    Filter parent node cell-line and parse child nodes for required annotations
    getPathways()
    Extract the pathway item from a node in the DrugBank .xml file
    getPubChemAnnotations()
    Get a selected annotation for all PubChem entries
    getPubChemCompound()
    getPubChemCompound
    getPubChemFromNSC()
    getPubChemFromNSC
    getPubChemSubstance()
    getPubChemSubstance
    getRequestPubChem()
    Constructs and executes a GET request to the PubChem PUG REST API
    getUniChemSources()
    Fetch a table of cheminformatic databases which can be mapped between using the UniChem 2.0 API
    httpRequestUniChem()
    Generic helper method to make arbitary REST API request to UniChem v2
    infer_gencode_type()
    Guess the type of a Gencode file from its name
    listColToDT()
    Convert a list column in a data.table to a data.table
    moleculeQuery()
    Query the ChEMBL molecule API end-point
    parseJSON() parseJSON()
    Parse a JSON into a list
    postRequestUniChem()
    Make POST requests to UniChem 2.0 compounds or connectivity endpoint
    queryCellosaurus()
    Access and parse Cellosaurus xml for developers
    queryPubChem()
    queryPubChem
    queryRequestPubChem()
    Query the PubChem REST API, with the result automatically converted from JSON to a list. This only works when output='JSON' in getRequestPubChem.
    queryUniChem()
    Use the UniChem 2.0 API to map compound identifiers between different public databases
    queryUniProt()
    Query the UniProt website REST API
    scrapeRemoteFTPFilesTable()
    Retrieve a table of files available from an FTP download site by scraping the first HTML table at the specified URL.
    zenodoMetadata()
    Build the required metadata for uploading a file to zenodo

    Developed by Christopher Eeles, Sisira Nair, Petr Smirnov, Shahzada Farooq, Benjamin Haibe-Kains.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.6.
